evidence.claim: EHT DAO utilizes AWS cloud services for infrastructure.
The platform supports FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Integration patterns include use of Kafka for real-time data processing.
Compliance with HIPAA regulations is maintained for healthcare applications.
EDI and X12 standards are implemented for transactional data handling.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 for healthcare data exchange in various integrations.
matched_use_cases: Data exchange with providers and payers
